about_the_game:
Note: Madness Arena is currently still a game under going many changes and development, and many features are still in development, including boss fights, equipment shops, new maps, and various quality-of-life improvements. We invite all players to join and support us in this journey by purchasing the game, playing it, and sharing constructive feedbacks.

Welcome to the stealth launch of Madness Arena, an exhilarating peer-to-peer PVPVE experience for up to 16 players (starting with 8 players). The game features a unique blend of anime-inspired art set against semi-realistic environments, enhanced with dynamic manga-style effects. Our primary focus is on delivering a fun and chaotic experience.

In the coming months and years, we plan to continuously expand the game with new characters (10+ characters every quarter planned), exciting features, and much more. We invite you to be part of this adventure as we strive to create one of the most mind blowing game ever, built with passion by gamers for gamers. Let's rock the world together!

The Backstory

Amidst daily stress, a manga artist finds solace in his dreamland, where his characters spring to life from ink and paper. In this vibrant realm, his creations reflect his inner struggles and aspirations. Their epic battles become a canvas for confronting his fears and frustrations, transforming his dreams into a sanctuary of creativity and catharsis.

  • Illustrative, Anime-Styled Characters and VFX
    Unique, anime-inspired player characters and special effects that visually captivate and engage players.

  • Realistic and Anime-Blended Environments
    Familiar, real-world environments combined with anime aesthetics, creating an immersive and visually stunning play area.

  • Boss Raids and Events
    Special raids and in-game events that enhance skills and increase damage, providing new challenges and excitement during battles.

  • Expanded Player Capacity (Up to 16 Players):Increased player slots to support up to 16 participants, allowing for more intense and competitive gameplay experiences.

  • Character Customization
    Diverse outfit options for characters, enabling extensive customization and providing monetization opportunities through in-game purchases.

  • Robust and Secure Gameplay:
    Advanced security measures to ensure fair play and prevent cheating, maintaining a balanced and enjoyable gaming environment.

  • PlayFab Multiplayer System
    Feature: Integration of PlayFab for competitive ranking, matchmaking, and multiplayer system enhancements, ensuring a smooth and competitive online experience.

  • In-House Motion Capture
    Beautifully crafted motion captures for creating unique movesets and animations, distinguishing our game from competitors who rely on off-the-shelf solutions.

name: Madness Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (3.4 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti OR AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p / 60fps / Low Quality Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 (2.8 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 7 1800X (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 OR AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p / 60fps / High Quality Settings

short_description: Enter the ultimate battleground, where chaos reigns and survival is everything. Every decision could be your last—will you rise to the challenge or descend into madness? Master powerful abilities, crush your enemies, and prove your worth in Madness Arena.
